alert.note: Alert for Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and eastern Lee Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Charleston Park to Lehigh Acres to 8 miles northwest of Big Corkscrew Island. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, Olga, Southwest Florida Airport, Buckingham, Charleston Park, Gateway, Alva, Fort Myers Shores and Estero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
